1101000000111001 1000111010010110 0 -> sum: 0101111011001111, cout: 1
0111101010100011 1001010000111011 1 -> sum: 0000111011011111, cout: 1
1101010110101000 0011001101011000 0 -> sum: 0000100100000000, cout: 1
0101000100001011 1101011011111101 1 -> sum: 0010100000001001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
